content:
A set of 3-4 pens in different colors and styles will provide Rachel with a nice variety for her daily tasks.

A small gift box or case can be a lovely touch, but it's not necessary. It depends on your budget and the overall presentation you want to make. Here are some pros and cons to consider:

**Pros of a gift box or case:**

* Adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the gift
* Helps keep the pens organized and protected
* Can be reused for storing other small items

**Cons of a gift box or case:**

* Adds to the overall cost of the gift
* Might make the gift feel more expensive than you intended
* Could be seen as unnecessary or extravagant

If you do decide to get a gift box or case, look for something simple and understated. A small, velvet-lined box or a compact pen case with a magnetic closure would be a nice addition. You can find these types of accessories at office supply stores or online.

If you're on a tighter budget, you could consider a simple gift wrap or a small gift bag instead. This will still add a touch of thoughtfulness to the gift without breaking the bank.

Ultimately, the pens themselves are the main gift, and Rachel will likely appreciate the thought and effort you put into selecting a nice set. The gift box or case is just a nice bonus.
